txt.en: 'The news you brought me is grim, but I think there are measures we can take to even the battlefield a little. Share your report with my father and advise him to send small forays against the enemy. It may be that we can weaken their defences before initiating a full counterassault on Torsbury.'
You patrolled the fields to the south of Torsbury as Torferth had requested and discovered a wide array of enemies.
Talk to Thane Tordag in his encampment

'So, Torferth believes we should make small forays against the enemy to weaken their defences? While I can certainly see the value in such things, I believe a more direct approach would be better...Dudsig here agrees. He arrived shortly after you did.\n\n'I have a task that I think better suits your talents.'
Thane Tordag is at his encampment, north of the road between Torsbury and Stoke.\n\nTorferth instructed you to bring your report to his father, Thane Tordag.
